short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put tabs into Wardrobe and take them out later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Out of sight, out of mind
Hide tabs when you switch to something else, and bring them back when you need them again.

Read later
Keep tabs in Wardrobe until you have time to work with them.

Less noise, less memory
Be less distracted by tabs you donâ€™t need right now, and free some RAM too.

New in 1.1.0 - added import/export.
